description: Test your knowledge on creating effective CVs
objectives: Tailor a CV to a job description
generated_text:
Module 10: CV (70 minutes, Intermediate)
Test your knowledge on creating effective CVs. Answer 10 multiple-choice questions to assess your understanding of CV structure, content, and formatting. Topics include:
- Contact information
- Work experience
- Education and skills
Evaluate your ability to tailor a CV to a job description and identify common mistakes to avoid.
